name: nastiness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of being bad or very unpleasant: She was wary of the nastiness of politics. A chef reveals the nastiness inside upscale restaurant kitchens: old fish, grimy meat, and rivers of butter.
unkind behaviour or an unkind character: As well as an essential goodness in our souls, there might also be a streak of downright nastiness or evil. Sometimes that nastiness is simply unbridled religious bigotry.
the quality of being rude and offensive: For me it is the nastiness of the comment that is the problem. There's a danger of sarcasm becoming nastiness. See
